# xeepy

> Python üêç Free X/Twitter automation toolkit. Scrape replies, followers, tweets. Mass unfollow non-followers. AI-powered engagement. No API keys needed - uses browser automation. Extract Replies to a Specific Tweet using Python and Tweepy - Scrape Any Tweet Reply

## Overview

xeepy is an open-source project by nirholas. Python üêç Free X/Twitter automation toolkit. Scrape replies, followers, tweets. Mass unfollow non-followers. AI-powered engagement. No API keys needed - uses browser automation. Extract Replies to a Specific Tweet using Python and Tweepy - Scrape Any Tweet Reply
